get.description: Get ontour based on serviceType (AM, FM, TV), idType (callsign, applicationId, fileNumber, antennaId). Response returned in GeoJSON or GML.

parameters.name: idType
parameters.description:
idType.

Valid values: facilityId, callsign, fileNumber (TV and FM only), applicationId (TV and FM only), antenna ID (AM only)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description:
id,

. Values of facilityId, callsign, filenumber, applicationId, or antennaId.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description:
Format for the returned results.

Valid values: json, kml, gml

parameters.name: stationClass
parameters.description:
class of the station (can be A, B, C, or D).

AM only. Value will ignored for TV and FM.

parameters.name: timePeriod
parameters.description:
timePeriod.

AM only (Values can be day for now). Value will be ignored for TV and FM

get.summary: Get all IDs for a service.
get.description: Get all IDs based on service type (e.g., get all call signs for TV).  Return all IDs in an array. Limited to 100 items for demo purpose.

parameters.name: idType
parameters.description:
idType.

Valid values: facilityId, callsign, file number (TV and FM only), applicationId (TV and FM only), antenna ID (AM only)

parameters.name: format
parameters.description:
Format for the returned results.

Valid values: json

get.summary: Download contour by service type, ID type, ID, and format.
get.description: Download a contour by service type (TV, FM, or AM), ID type (facilityId, callsign, file number, application ID).

parameters.name: idType
parameters.description:
idType.

Valid values: facilityId, callsign, fileNumber (TV and FM only), applicationId (TV and FM only), antenna ID (AM only)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description:
id,

. Values of facilityId, callsign, filenumber, applicationId, or antennaId.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description:
Format for the returned results.

Valid values: json, kml, gml, csv, zip (shapefile)
